FilterItemPortable.Name: Pesquisar por
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="CODIGO"> <FieldDefinitionName>IntegerFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>maior ou igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="CODIGO"> <FieldDefinitionName>IntegerFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>menor ou igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator><=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="3" FieldName="CODIGOREFERENCIA"> <FieldDefinitionName>StringFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>contém</Name> <DatabaseOperator>LIKE</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> <ValueSubstitutionPattern>%{0}%</ValueSubstitutionPattern> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="4" FieldName="FAMILIA"> <FieldDefinitionName>AssociationFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <Properties /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="5" FieldName="NOME"> <FieldDefinitionName>StringFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>contém</Name> <DatabaseOperator>LIKE</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> <ValueSubstitutionPattern>%{0}%</ValueSubstitutionPattern> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="6" FieldName="DESCRICAO"> <FieldDefinitionName>TextFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>não vazio</Name> <DatabaseOperator>IS NOT NULL</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>true</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
